Team ISHHospitality education. Reimagined.

Our faculty philosophy is simple. We want our students to become the best at what they do- which is why we have gathered a faculty of experts that know what its like to be the best. Our students are under the guidance and tutelage of a team that is passionate, diverse, and knows the industry inside and out.

Our faculty philosophy
